about_the_game:
In the bounds of darkness hiding from light...

In the soul of every nightmare...

In the deepest ravines that lay beneath our world...

In the chasmic rifts of time...

A terror awaits in a cycle that challenges the very fabric of society, beneath which it lays dormant. It sleeps down in the dark, waiting for the day that it shall rise up and return to power.

True horror cannot die. It only waits for the right moment of return.

Dragged into a dark conspiracy, explore and survive your way through the beginning of the end for the nation of Australia. Use your wits and instinct to stay alive in this 2000s-style first person liminal exploratory horror shooter set down under during the 1990s.

AMYGDALA: Prelude takes the player on a journey spanning over 25 areas set in the great southern land, spanning from a typical Australian city to treacherous costal areas, and all the way down to the unseen depths of the ocean. Fight a variety of horrfying enemies, ranging from mutated huntsman spiders the size of newspapers up to monsterous hybrid humans that can decapitate with one fell swoop.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains depictions of blood, gore injury, general (non-sexual) nudity and decapitation. Viewer discretion is advised.
